title: Episode 193: Doing Our Best with Busy Philipps
itunes:title: Episode 193: Doing Our Best with Busy Philipps
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree manifest their dream guest and talk with actor, podcaster, author, and fashion icon Busy Philipps about her complex relationship to anger, how she loves a facial tool and dermaplaned her own face, and how she’s reframing the narrative ar...
description:
Kate and Doree manifest their dream guest and talk with actor, podcaster, author, and fashion icon Busy Philipps about her complex relationship to anger, how she loves a facial tool and dermaplaned her own face, and how she’s reframing the narrative around talking about women’s health. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
